document.heading: OFFICE OF CABLE TELEVISION PERSONAL PROPERTY INSURANCE AUTHORIZATION AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-151, the “Office of Cable Television Personal Property Insurance Authorization Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-545, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 1, 1990, and May 15, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 30, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-209 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
